column1: plottin up listening to all these remixes. breakfast for a king. beasty be in the hood chillin! the masters plan is the master plan. getting faded. rt suge knight collapsed in court today after his bail was set at $25 million. rt let go of what's gone, be grateful for what remains and look forward to what's ahead of you #keepgoing #youareblessed rt #fact today is the tomorrow you were worried about yesterday... it's time to live!! #letsgo!!! sometimes i want to drop a tear but no emotions from a king. omw to work. #teemiceykiks but to be honest. i pass my bitch how i pass my dank! 80's flow poppin. i don't want to sound stupid and say all them hoes aint loyal. half the time you need cold hard facts 1st. #sneekybitches yeah, i still talk the same shit like i used too, fuck bad bitches like i used to. eat scrimps and sip drank! a nigga should have worn the trey in hs. the truth will unmask a good woman while lies will hold back a good man. #speakupspeakthetruth on these weights in my bak house! 21. ?'s still knocks. #superclassik but then again, crack sells to those who use, therefore running plays that makes things worse just don't healp! i really just want to beat the odds. being an adverse statistic should never be the case. life ain't no two way street. it's more like one big paved dirt road. chillin.. i haven't paid for gas since my berthday. bout to smoke up wit my hg! i was high as fuck is thus pic! inglewood's finest.. wishing everyone a happy wednesday. on these notes cause i can be. taxi flow i sweer half this time of mine be dedicated to success. if you see her in a 84 cutlass.. any way.. i pick up my   745li tomorrow. #yboss when you see a bitch you fucked working at the car dealership! on god, that's why i love ghetto bitches.. yupp! rt get rid of the doubt. add love. been about this get money shit. now it's time to reap the reward.. #haaaahhhnn rt from the to the is staying on the west coast! #nflfreeagency i be chillin! bitch i'm racked up! wass poppin!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
